text:
The RO and restrictions on communications is exactly why it is in place. I will not tolerate and put up with this
Message 1545 of 4024
Christine, we both know you are a liar. We both know you told me you did not tell anybody especially the Cabo crew, but you did. That means you’
re a liar.
This is also very much related to our children. It was in the plan that you never adopted so I don’t know how child related things are violation of the
RO.
We know this format does not work and only further inflames things and make us hate. But it is your choice to continue this way rather than be
peaceful and civil.
It’s funny that the woman who quoted the definition of insanity to me over and over for years doesn’t recognize that now. Want to try something
new?
I’m game if you are, because this doesn’t work
Have a great day
Sent:02/22/2024 at 08:53 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/22/2024 at 08:54 AM)
Subject:Re: Wow...
Message 1546 of 4024
I really would like to try something new. I want to get along with you again. This is a difficult time for us and we are only making it worse this way,
not being able to just clear the air and ask simple questions, has us resorting to lobbing hang grenades at each other. I ask you for a simple five minutes
and you reject it at every turn. This honestly is not working. I implore you to please consider another way. What is the harm in just trying at Christine
Sent:02/22/2024 at 09:00 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/22/2024 at 09:01 AM)
Subject:I meant what I said
Message 1547 of 4024
Thoughts? Will you consider smoking the peace pipe? I’ve asked for weeks now. Isn’t it worth a try. If it goes sideways we obviously can come back to
this hell. But if it works we can change this entire dynamic.
Sent:02/22/2024 at 09:09 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/22/2024 at 10:44 AM)
Subject:Re: I meant what I said
Message 1548 of 4024
It is not safe.
Sent:02/22/2024 at 09:14 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/22/2024 at 09:36 AM)
Subject:Re: I meant what I said
